requirements.name: Decennial Report
requirements.description: Report filed with the Pennsylvania Department of State every 10 years (not annual)

requirements.name: Charitable Organization Registration (BCO-10)
requirements.description: Initial registration with the Pennsylvania Department of State Bureau of Charitable Organizations

requirements.name: Annual Registration (BCO-10)
requirements.description: Annual financial report filed with the Bureau of Charitable Organizations

requirements.name: Form 990 Series
requirements.description: IRS Form 990, 990-EZ, or 990-N required for tax-exempt organizations

requirements.name: PA Corporate Tax Report (RCT-101)
requirements.description: Pennsylvania corporate tax report for exempt organizations (may be exempt from tax but must file)
requirements.due_date: 15th day of 4th month after fiscal year end

requirements.name: Sales Tax Exemption Certificate (REV-1715)
requirements.description: Exemption certificate for qualifying nonprofit purchases

requirements.name: Unemployment Compensation Registration (UC-2)
requirements.description: Register with the Pennsylvania Department of Labor & Industry if organization has employees

requirements.name: Professional Fundraiser Registration
requirements.description: Registration required if using professional solicitors

notes: Pennsylvania has unique requirements including a decennial (10-year) corporate report rather than annual. The Bureau of Charitable Organizations oversees charitable solicitation. Organizations with revenue under $25,000 may be exempt from registration requirements.
